评论概述: I like it especially since I knew what to expect.
评论详情: It IS cropped and pretty shear just to note. But I think it looks great with a black tank top underneath and really any bottoms you like. Also the top half of the arm fits nicely and around the elbow it flares out. I think that makes it even better. Although you should hand wash it which really isn’t any hassle, or you could put it on a quick wash in the washer by itself. I was a little worried about the lace ripping, but I bought this several months ago and have worn it a lot, and it indeed has held up! Would definitely recommend! Just be careful with it, not super rough.

Very comfortable! Size is perfect and colors are vivid. Very sheer!!!! To me, it’s great. If you are the modest type, you will want a bra. But that would destroy the whole affect of the top. This little top is meant to flaunt not cover up. I LOVE it!

I love the 70's style clothes, the flare blouse sleeves, bell bottoms, platforms, the whole fun loving 70's clothing. When I saw this blouse, I loved the look and was excited to buy it. I am a small petite woman; 5'2 and 128. Therefore, I bought a size small, which I wear. When I put this shirt on, it just went over my size A breast. Not even close to being a crop top. In my defense, the photo makes it look more like it should be a mid-driff top. I also was not expecting to have to wear a tank top under it. It is extremely shear to the point of why bothering wearing anything at all.  I am returning the top and instead of risking the next one being the same way in size, I am asking for a refund.

the flared sleeves are when drew me to this top, and those are GORGEOUS, but the rest of the top is a bit downhill after that. i recommend sizing up one or two sizes if you can, and plan on using the shirt for layering outfits. that may be obvious, but i was a bit put off by the mesh fabric (not the most comfortable if you bought it true to size and not a little loose), but it’s nice nonetheless!! the pattern is a bit generic, but it’s a great top to layer over/ under a tank or another shirt!!! it’s basically cropped at the stomach, so be prepared to have to pull it down a lot, or safety pin it to yer other clothes !
pretty! this shirt is very see through, so make sure to wear something underneath ;;

i enjoyed the print on this shirt, super cute!! it is true to size and the texture isn’t uncomfortable. the only thing that i noticed is the shirt is more cropped than showed in the image. i dont mind it but some might.

This shirt is okay but had I known what it'd be like in person I probably wouldn't have bought it. First of all, the colors are way more bright than expected. Based on the photo, I thought it would be a mild sage-ish green, but instead it is a bold forest color. Second of all, it's cropped a lot shorter than expected, it barely covers my bust and that's with my arms down! I thought it'd be mid-rib length. Finally, the shirt is VERY sheer. I knew it would be sheer but I didn't expect it to be quite so extreme. The quality of the actual material is nice, so points for that. But I feel like this product needs some better photos.
The quality is really good and it fits really well! I didn't expect such quality but I love the shirt

This shirt is amazing. If you have a large bust, it may not fit as well, but for those like me, it's perfect. Paired with a spaghetti string crop top, it is wonderful. It's a thin, light weight floral top. The bell sleeves are beyond words. I wish it came in more colors, I would wear it everyday (or a new one everyday).

For reference I’m 126 lbs, 36C, and the large JUST FIT. I’d have liked an XL option but this will work. Very cute. I’m also just 5’0” and it hit right at my waist, so if you’re any taller it will definitely be a crop top.
This top is 100% sheer but that's cute! I'm a medium and that's what I bought. It fits perfectly and sits right at my waist. I'm definitely going to buy the black one now too.
